panels.description: The amount of power being drawn
panels.title: Realtime Usage

panels.description: Total amount of power consumed by the system over the last 24 hours
panels.title: 24hr Consumption

panels.description: Serial lines and errors per 5 minutes
panels.title: Serial Data

options.content:
These charts are only meaningful if using the PSU for battery charging. 
Enter the nominal battery capacity in the BatteryCapacity variable at 
the top of this page. The BatteryCapacity is currently set to ${BatteryCapacity}. 


To get the most accurate estimate of remaining charge, charge the battery to
100% and then restart the bbd agent.

panels.description: Estimated using the "Counting Coulombs" method. The battery is assumed full when the bbd-agent is started. To calibrate this, charge the battery to full with an external charger, then restart the agent.
panels.title: Estimated State of Charge
